participant_1.background:
My family and business are my top priorities.
I remember buying a video game console so I can play with my son.
I like to spend my days reading and watching documentaries to learn more about the world.
i am a librarian.
I'm always trying to come up with new beats for my band.

participant_2.background:
I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories.
i work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager.
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
i have a garden.
I collect movie posters from my favorite films.

content.text: Hi there, how has your day been?
Hi, it's been good, thanks for asking! I went to the park with my family and we had a lot of fun.
That sounds lovely, I'm glad to hear that. I'm a librarian, and I love to read and watch documentaries to learn more about the world. What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love to travel and I've been to many countries. I also love to garden and collect movie posters from my favorite films.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to travel but I haven't had the chance yet. I love movies, too! What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption. It's such a heartwarming and inspiring story.
I love that movie too! It's so well-made and the acting is incredible.
Yes, it is! I'm glad you like it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. We often go out to eat or go to the park. I also enjoy reading and watching documentaries.
That sounds great! It's important to have a good balance of work and fun.
I agree! I'm glad that you're a librarian. I love books and I think it's a great job.
Thank you! I love my job and I'm glad that I can help people find the books that they want to read.
That's wonderful! I'm sure you make a difference in the lives of your patrons.
I hope so! I love to help people learn and grow
